books.title: It Ends With Us
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A passionate story of love, heartbreak, and the ultimate strength of a woman who must make a difficult choice for her future.

books.title: Verity
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A struggling writer takes a job ghostwriting for an injured author, only to uncover dark secrets in her manuscript.

books.title: Ugly Love
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A love story about two people who agree to a no-strings-attached arrangement, only to find their agreement complicated by unexpected feelings.

books.title: Reminders of Him
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: After serving five years in prison, a young woman returns to her hometown hoping to reunite with her daughter, only to face an uphill battle.

books.title: Confess
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A captivating story of an artist who finds love, complicated by the secrets each character holds.

books.title: Regretting You
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A mother and daughter navigate grief and new beginnings after a tragedy exposes family secrets.

books.title: Maybe Someday
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A heartwarming story about a girl who finds love and music in unexpected places after a difficult breakup.

books.title: November 9
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A unique love story where a boy and a girl meet once a year on the same day, navigating life's changes and their evolving relationship.

books.title: All Your Perfects
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A powerful novel exploring the complexities of a marriage and the challenges a couple faces when their love is tested.

books.title: Heart Bones
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: After a devastating loss, a young woman finds solace and unexpected love during a summer away from home.

books.title: Layla
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A supernatural romance that delves into love, grief, and the lines between life and death.

books.title: Too Late
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A chilling and intense tale of love, obsession, and the dark side of human nature.

books.title: Hopeless
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A forbidden love story filled with secrets, lies, and the courage to uncover the truth.

books.title: Losing Hope
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: The companion novel to 'Hopeless,' told from Dean Holder's perspective, offering new insights into their tumultuous relationship.

books.title: Maybe Not
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A novella in the 'Maybe Someday' series, exploring the complex, friends-with-benefits relationship between Warren and Bridgette.
